cocktails.name: Frozen Strawberry-Basil Margarita
cocktails.ingredients: 1 lime wedge, coarse sugar (optional), 1 1/2 oz blanco tequila, 1 oz triple sec, 1/2 oz freshly squeezed lime juice, 1 cup frozen unsweetened sliced strawberries, 4 basil leaves, fresh strawberries (optional)
cocktails.directions: Rim the glass using lime and sugar. Place tequila, triple sec, lime juice, straberries and basil in a blender; cover and process until smooth. Pour into prepared glass. Garnish with lime wedge, strawberries and/or basil leaves

cocktails.name: Passion Fruit Margarita
cocktails.ingredients: 2 oz tequila, 1 oz Grand Marnier or Cointreau, 1 oz passion fruit puree, 3/4 oz fresh lime juice, 3/4 oz simple syrup, tajin or salt for the rim, dehydrated lime slices for garnish.
cocktails.directions: Rim the glass using lime and tajin. In a cocktail shaker, combine the tequila, grand marnier, passion fruit, lime, and simple syrup with a couple cubes of ice and shake vigorously. Fill glass with ice and strain into the prepared cocktail glass and garnish with a dehydrated lime slice, if desired.

cocktails.name: Long island iced tea
cocktails.ingredients:
3/4 ounce vodka
3/4 ounce white rum
3/4 ounce silver tequila
3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce triple sec
3/4 ounce simple syrup
3/4 ounce lemon juice, freshly squeezed
Cola, to top
Garnish: lemon wedg
cocktails.directions:
Add the vodka, rum, tequila, gin, triple sec, simple syrup and lemon juice to a Collins glass filled with ice.

Top with a splash of the cola and stir briefly.

Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Serve with a straw.

cocktails.name: Backyard iced tea
cocktails.ingredients:
2 ounces spiced rum
2 ounces lemonade
1 ounce unsweetened iced tea
Garnish: lemon wedge
cocktails.directions:
Fill a highball glass with ice, then add the spiced rum, lemonade and unsweetened iced tea and stir to combine.

Garnish with a lemon wedge.
